subtitles: 0: [00:03:18,396 - 00:03:20,419] Dr. Miranda Bailey: OK, people, the rules of trauma.

2: [00:03:21,961 - 00:03:23,703] Dr. Miranda Bailey: They don't know the ass from their esophagus.
3: [00:03:24,143 - 00:03:27,425] Dr. Miranda Bailey: So fast, discharge fast to get bodies up to the OR yesterday.
4: [00:03:27,485 - 00:03:29,810] Dr. Miranda Bailey: And don't let me catch you fighting over patients, got it?
